column4: i have a little problem , i use kaffeine in Ubuntu(gnome) for watching DVB i get video but not audio Please Help.
maybe kaffeine, a KDE application, is trying to use aRTs. If possible, reconfigure it to use esd or alsa or OSS.
i tried setting it to use esd alsa or OSS to no avail...
any sugestions possibly any codecs to install?
mplayer wont work for me I need Kaffeine for DVB-T
is there anyone that can give me some proper help?
that's precisely why I think its a sound daemon issue
Please elaborate , sound works in XMMS and Totem(gstreamer)
I've already told you it, scroll back and read what I said.
I've never used Kaffeine, so all I can tell you is to search for the options for it not to use the aRTS KDE daemon.
Thanks , but that still doest solve my problem , I've tried everything up to 3oclock this morning and still no go , I've even istalled arts
I've never used Kaffeine, so the best I can do is give my best guess.
